mapper.select:
with a_table as (
select t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,
t.store_code, t.store_name,
t.set_code,to_char(t.set_name) set_name,
t.dept_code, t.dept_name,
t.med_type_code,t.med_type_name,sum(t.amount_money) as amount_money from( select a.group_id,a.hos_id,a.copy_code,a.store_code,a.store_name,a.set_code, a.set_name,b.dept_code,b.dept_name,a.med_type_code,a.med_type_name, sum(a.amount_money) as amount_money from (
select mom.group_id,mom.hos_id,mom.copy_code,hsd.store_code,hsd.store_name,
mss.set_code,mss.set_name,
null set_code, null set_name,
mom.dept_id,hdd.dept_code,hdd.dept_name, mid.med_type_id,mtd.med_type_code,mtd.med_type_name, sum(nvl(mod.amount_money, 0)) as amount_money from med_out_main mom LEFT JOIN med_bus_type mbt ON mom.bus_type_code = mbt.bus_type_code left join med_out_detail mod on mom.group_id = mod.group_id and mom.hos_id = mod.hos_id and mom.copy_code = mod.copy_code and mom.out_id = mod.out_id left join med_inv_dict mid on mod.group_id=mid.group_id and mod.hos_id=mid.hos_id and mod.copy_code=mid.copy_code and mod.inv_id = mid.inv_id
and mod.inv_no = mid.inv_no
and mid.is_stop = 0
and mid.is_stop = 0 left join med_type_dict mtd on mid.group_id=mtd.group_id and mid.hos_id=mtd.hos_id and mid.copy_code=mtd.copy_code and mid.med_type_id = mtd.med_type_id
and mtd.is_stop = 0
left join hos_dept_dict hdd on mom.group_id = hdd.group_id and mom.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and mom.dept_id = hdd.dept_id
and mom.dept_no = hdd.dept_no
and hdd.is_stop = 0
LEFT JOIN hos_store_dict hsd ON mom.group_id = hsd.group_id AND mom.hos_id = hsd.hos_id AND mom.store_id = hsd.store_id
and mom.store_no = hsd.store_no
AND hsd.is_stop = 0
LEFT JOIN med_store_detail msd ON mom.group_id = msd.group_id AND mom.hos_id = msd.hos_id AND mom.store_id = msd.store_id LEFT JOIN med_store_set mss ON msd.group_id = mss.group_id AND msd.hos_id = mss.hos_id AND msd.set_id = mss.set_id
where mom.group_id = #{group_id} and mom.hos_id = #{hos_id} and mom.copy_code = #{copy_code} and mbt.sel_flag = 'out'
and mom.state = '3'
and to_char(mom.confirm_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') between #{begin_date} and #{end_date}
and mom.bus_type_code in ${bus_type_code}
and mom.bus_type_code in (3, 21, 9,11,13,23,49,50)
and mom.store_id in ( select perm_code from v_user_data_perm where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and table_code = 'HOS_STORE_DICT' and user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_read = 1 and is_write = 1 )
and mom.store_id = #{store_id}
and mom.dept_id = #{dept_id}
and msd.set_id = #{set_id}
and mom.dept_id in ( select perm_code from v_user_data_perm where group_id = ${group_id} and hos_id = ${hos_id} and user_id = ${user_id} and table_code = 'HOS_DEPT_DICT' and is_read = 1 and is_write = 1)
and mom.dept_id is not null group by mtd.med_type_code,mtd.med_type_name,mom.group_id,mom.hos_id,mom.copy_code, mom.dept_id,hdd.dept_code,hdd.dept_name,mid.med_type_id,hsd.store_code, hsd.store_name
,mss.set_code,mss.set_name
) a left join hos_dept_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id
and a.dept_id = b.dept_id
and b.is_stop = 0
and a.dept_code like (b.dept_code|| '%') where b.is_last = '1' group by a.group_id,a.hos_id,a.copy_code,b.dept_code,b.dept_name, a.med_type_code,a.med_type_name,a.store_code,a.store_name, a.set_code,a.set_name )t group by t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code,
t.store_code,t.store_name,
t.set_code,t.set_name,
t.dept_code,t.dept_name,
t.med_type_code,t.med_type_name ) select a.* from a_table a union all
select null as group_id,null as hos_id,null as copy_code,
null as store_code,null as store_name,
null as set_code,to_char('合计') as set_name,
null as dept_code,NULL as dept_name,
null as med_type_code,null as med_type_name,sum(temp.amount_money) as amount_money from a_table temp
